name: Area clear, access good, enough space for install
HRV installed straight and level and correct orientation.
HRV seismically braced and vibration isolated
Heater Bank installed to Manufacturers instructions
Fire dampers installed to manufacturers instructions. Drop tested where applicable
Breakaway joins either side of fire dampers
Access Panels in duct for fire dampers, filters, cleaning etc
Ductwork straight/level and well supported incl any seismic restraints
Duct fittings/joins sealed and mechanically fixed to duct.  SAB joins sealed
Balancing Dampers locked open and accessible
Flexible ducts taped then cable tied
Second fix grille and access panel locations recorded
All open ducts sealed off with plastic film or similar
Plans marked up for As Builts and 2nd fix grille locations
Fans/Filters/Dampers/Access Panels etc all still accessible for maintenance
Area left clean and tidy, finger prints removed
